mapper.sql:
CONST (ONE_DAY_OF_MINUTES, DATA_GAP_MARKER, MAX_GAP_MINUTES, MAX_INTERPOLATION_DAYS, MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE, INPUT_START_DATE, INPUT_END_DATE) AS (
SELECT 60*24 ONE_DAY_OF_MINUTES, -999 DATA_GAP_MARKER, 60 MAX_GAP_MINUTES,
60 MAX_INTERPOLATION_DAYS, 0.1 MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE, #{startTime, jdbcType=CHAR} INPUT_START_DATE, #{endTime, jdbcType=CHAR} INPUT_END_DATE From DUAL )

, RAW_MTI_DATA (GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME, GAP_MINUTES) AS (
SELECT
GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, CASE WHEN END_VALUE = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) THEN LEAD(END_VALUE) OVER (ORDER BY START_TIME) ELSE END_VALUE END as END_VALUE, START_TIME, CASE WHEN END_VALUE = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) THEN LEAD(END_TIME) OVER (ORDER BY START_TIME) ELSE END_TIME END AS END_TIME, GAP_MINUTES FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME,
CASE WHEN LEAD(START_VALUE) OVER (ORDER BY START_TIME) = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) AND LEAD(END_VALUE) OVER (ORDER BY START_TIME) = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) THEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((LEAD(END_TIME) OVER (ORDER BY START_TIME) - START_TIME)*60*24)) ELSE 0 END AS GAP_MINUTES FROM ( Select
GROUP_ID, FINAL_VALUE AS START_VALUE, LEAD(FINAL_VALUE) OVER (ORDER BY MEASUREMENT_DATE) AS END_VALUE, MEASUREMENT_DATE AS START_TIME, LEAD(MEASUREMENT_DATE) OVER (ORDER BY MEASUREMENT_DATE) AS END_TIME From TIME_SERIES_STAR Where SITE_ID=( SELECT SITE_ID FROM ( SELECT SITE_ID, CASE WHEN NWIS_SITE_NO IS NULL THEN SHORT_NAME ELSE NWIS_SITE_NO END AS SITE_NAME FROM SITE_STAR ) WHERE SITE_NAME = #{siteName, jdbcType=CHAR} ) And GROUP_ID= #{groupId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
AND MEASUREMENT_DATE > (to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') - (SELECT MAX_INTERPOLATION_DAYS FROM CONST)) AND MEASUREMENT_DATE < (to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') + (SELECT MAX_INTERPOLATION_DAYS FROM CONST)) ) ) WHERE NOT (START_VALUE = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) AND END_VALUE = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST)) ) )

, RAW_GAP_DATA (GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME, DURATION_MINUTES, GAP_MINUTES) AS (
SELECT GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((END_TIME - START_TIME)*60*24)) AS DURATION_MINUTES, GAP_MINUTES FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME,
CASE WHEN END_VALUE = (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) THEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((END_TIME - START_TIME)*60*24)) ELSE 0 END AS GAP_MINUTES FROM ( Select
GROUP_ID, FINAL_VALUE AS START_VALUE, LEAD(FINAL_VALUE) OVER (ORDER BY MEASUREMENT_DATE) AS END_VALUE, MEASUREMENT_DATE AS START_TIME, LEAD(MEASUREMENT_DATE) OVER (ORDER BY MEASUREMENT_DATE) AS END_TIME From TIME_SERIES_STAR Where SITE_ID=( SELECT SITE_ID FROM ( SELECT SITE_ID, CASE WHEN NWIS_SITE_NO IS NULL THEN SHORT_NAME ELSE NWIS_SITE_NO END AS SITE_NAME FROM SITE_STAR ) WHERE SITE_NAME = #{siteName, jdbcType=CHAR} ) And GROUP_ID= #{groupId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
AND MEASUREMENT_DATE >= (to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')) AND MEASUREMENT_DATE <= (to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')) ) ) ) )

, gap_duration (group_id, gap_start, gap_end, gap_minutes) as ( select group_id, gap_start, gap_end, extract ( day from (( gap_end - gap_start) * 60 * 24)) gap_minutes from ( select group_id, case when end_value = (select data_gap_marker from const) and lead(start_value) over (order by start_time) = (select data_gap_marker from const) then end_time end gap_start, case when end_value = (select data_gap_marker from const) and lead(start_value) over (order by start_time) = (select data_gap_marker from const) then lead(start_time) over (order by start_time) end gap_end from raw_gap_data where not (start_value = (select data_gap_marker from const) and end_value = (select data_gap_marker from const))) where gap_start is not null and gap_end is not null)

, CLEAN_MTI_DATA (GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME, DURATION_MINUTES, GAP_MINUTES, IS_START_INTERPOLATED, IS_END_INTERPOLATED) AS (
SELECT GROUP_ID, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, LEAST(START_VALUE, END_VALUE) AS MIN_VALUE, GREATEST(START_VALUE, END_VALUE) AS MAX_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((END_TIME - START_TIME)*60*24)) AS DURATION_MINUTES, GAP_MINUTES, IS_START_INTERPOLATED, IS_END_INTERPOLATED FROM ( SELECT GROUP_ID,
CASE WHEN START_TIME < to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') THEN START_VALUE + (EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') - START_TIME) * (SELECT ONE_DAY_OF_MINUTES FROM CONST)))) * ((END_VALUE - START_VALUE)/(EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((END_TIME - START_TIME) * (SELECT ONE_DAY_OF_MINUTES FROM CONST))))) ELSE START_VALUE END AS START_VALUE,
CASE WHEN END_TIME > to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') THEN START_VALUE + (EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') - START_TIME) * (SELECT ONE_DAY_OF_MINUTES FROM CONST)))) * ((END_VALUE - START_VALUE)/(EXTRACT(DAY FROM ((END_TIME - START_TIME) * (SELECT ONE_DAY_OF_MINUTES FROM CONST))))) ELSE END_VALUE END AS END_VALUE,
CASE WHEN START_TIME < to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') THEN to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') ELSE START_TIME END AS START_TIME, CASE WHEN END_TIME > to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') THEN to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') ELSE END_TIME END AS END_TIME, GAP_MINUTES, CASE WHEN START_TIME < to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_START_INTERPOLATED, CASE WHEN END_TIME > to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_END_INTERPOLATED FROM RAW_MTI_DATA WHERE START_VALUE != (SELECT DATA_GAP_MARKER FROM CONST) AND END_TIME > to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AND START_TIME < to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AND NOT GAP_MINUTES > (SELECT MAX_GAP_MINUTES FROM CONST) AND NOT EXTRACT(DAY FROM (END_TIME - START_TIME)) > (SELECT MAX_INTERPOLATION_DAYS FROM CONST) Order by START_TIME ) Order by START_TIME )

, CONST_DATA (GROUP_ID, GAP_MINUTES, FIRST_MEASURE_DATE, LAST_MEASURE_DATE, OVERALL_DURATION_MINUTES, USER_DURATION_MINUTES, OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, OVERALL_MAX_VALUE, OVERALL_VALUE_RANGE, MEASUREMENT_COUNT) AS ( SELECT GROUP_ID, SUM(GAP_MINUTES) GAP_MINUTES, MIN(START_TIME) as FIRST_MEASURE_DATE, MAX(END_TIME) as LAST_MEASURE_DATE, SUM(DURATION_MINUTES) as OVERALL_DURATION_MINUTES, EXTRACT(DAY FROM (to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') - to_timestamp ((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'))*60*24) as USER_DURATION_MINUTES, MIN(MIN_VALUE) AS OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, MAX(MAX_VALUE) AS OVERALL_MAX_VALUE, MAX(MAX_VALUE) - MIN(MIN_VALUE) AS OVERALL_VALUE_RANGE, COUNT(*) AS MEASUREMENT_COUNT From CLEAN_MTI_DATA GROUP BY GROUP_ID )

, CONST_GAP_DATA (GROUP_ID, GAP_MINUTES, FIRST_MEASURE_DATE, LAST_MEASURE_DATE, OVERALL_DURATION_MINUTES, USER_DURATION_MINUTES, MEASUREMENT_COUNT) AS ( SELECT GROUP_ID, SUM(GAP_MINUTES) GAP_MINUTES, MIN(START_TIME) as FIRST_MEASURE_DATE, MAX(END_TIME) as LAST_MEASURE_DATE, SUM(DURATION_MINUTES) as OVERALL_DURATION_MINUTES, EXTRACT(DAY FROM (to_timestamp((SELECT INPUT_END_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') - to_timestamp ((SELECT INPUT_START_DATE FROM CONST), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'))*60*24) as USER_DURATION_MINUTES, COUNT(*) AS MEASUREMENT_COUNT From RAW_GAP_DATA GROUP BY GROUP_ID
)

LIN_BINS (BIN_NUMBER, LOW_BOUND, HIGH_BOUND) AS (
SELECT BIN_NUMBER, (SELECT ((OVERALL_VALUE_RANGE / #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) * (BIN_NUMBER - 1)) + OVERALL_MIN_VALUE FROM CONST_DATA) AS LOW_BOUND, CASE WHEN BIN_NUMBER = #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC} THEN (SELECT OVERALL_MAX_VALUE FROM CONST_DATA) ELSE (SELECT ((OVERALL_VALUE_RANGE / #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) * BIN_NUMBER) + OVERALL_MIN_VALUE FROM CONST_DATA) END AS HIGH_BOUND FROM INT_BINS ORDER BY BIN_NUMBER )

LOG_BINS (BIN_NUMBER, LOW_BOUND, HIGH_BOUND) AS (
SELECT 0 BIN_NUMBER, (SELECT OVERALL_MIN_VALUE FROM CONST_DATA) LOW_BOUND, (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST) HIGH_BOUND FROM DUAL WHERE (SELECT OVERALL_MIN_VALUE FROM CONST_DATA) < (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST) UNION ALL SELECT BIN_NUMBER, CASE WHEN BIN_NUMBER = 1 THEN (SELECT GREATEST(OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST)) FROM CONST_DATA) ELSE POWER(10, LOG_LOW_BOUND) END AS LOW_BOUND, CASE WHEN BIN_NUMBER = #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC} THEN (SELECT OVERALL_MAX_VALUE FROM CONST_DATA) ELSE POWER(10, LOG_HIGH_BOUND) END AS HIGH_BOUND FROM ( SELECT BIN_NUMBER, (SELECT (((LOG(10, OVERALL_MAX_VALUE) - LOG(10, GREATEST(OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST)))) / #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) * (BIN_NUMBER - 1)) + LOG(10, GREATEST(OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST))) FROM CONST_DATA) AS LOG_LOW_BOUND, (SELECT (((LOG(10, OVERALL_MAX_VALUE) - LOG(10, GREATEST(OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST)))) / #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) * BIN_NUMBER) + LOG(10, GREATEST(OVERALL_MIN_VALUE, (SELECT MIN_LOG_BIN_VALUE FROM CONST))) FROM CONST_DATA) AS LOG_HIGH_BOUND FROM INT_BINS ORDER BY BIN_NUMBER ) )
mapper.select:
WITH , , ,
SELECT BIN_NUMBER, SUM(IN_BIN_MINUTES) OVER (ORDER BY BIN_NUMBER DESC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) / (SELECT OVERALL_DURATION_MINUTES FROM CONST_DATA) * 100 AS CUMULATIVE_BIN_PERC, CASE WHEN BIN_NUMBER = 1 THEN LOW_BOUND WHEN BIN_NUMBER = #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC} THEN HIGH_BOUND ELSE (LOW_BOUND + HIGH_BOUND) / 2 END AS BIN_VALUE, IN_BIN_MINUTES, SUM(IN_BIN_MINUTES) OVER (ORDER BY BIN_NUMBER DESC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS CUMULATIVE_IN_BIN_MINUTES, LOW_BOUND, HIGH_BOUND FROM ( SELECT SUM(IN_BIN_MINUTES) AS IN_BIN_MINUTES, BIN_NUMBER, MAX(LOW_BOUND) AS LOW_BOUND, MAX(HIGH_BOUND) AS HIGH_BOUND FROM (
SELECT CASE
WHEN data.MIN_VALUE < bin.LOW_BOUND AND data.MAX_VALUE > bin.HIGH_BOUND THEN ((bin.HIGH_BOUND - bin.LOW_BOUND) / (data.MAX_VALUE - data.MIN_VALUE)) * data.DURATION_MINUTES
WHEN data.MIN_VALUE < bin.LOW_BOUND AND data.MAX_VALUE <= bin.HIGH_BOUND THEN ((data.MAX_VALUE - bin.LOW_BOUND) / (data.MAX_VALUE - data.MIN_VALUE)) * data.DURATION_MINUTES
WHEN data.MIN_VALUE < bin.HIGH_BOUND AND data.MAX_VALUE > bin.HIGH_BOUND THEN ((bin.HIGH_BOUND - data.MIN_VALUE) / (data.MAX_VALUE - data.MIN_VALUE)) * data.DURATION_MINUTES
ELSE data.DURATION_MINUTES END AS IN_BIN_MINUTES, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, LOW_BOUND, HIGH_BOUND, DURATION_MINUTES, START_VALUE, END_VALUE, START_TIME, END_TIME, BIN_NUMBER, GAP_MINUTES FROM ${binType} bin INNER JOIN CLEAN_MTI_DATA data ON (data.MIN_VALUE < bin.HIGH_BOUND AND data.MAX_VALUE > bin.LOW_BOUND) OR (data.MIN_VALUE = data.MAX_VALUE AND data.MIN_VALUE = bin.LOW_BOUND) OR (data.MIN_VALUE = bin.HIGH_BOUND AND bin.BIN_NUMBER = #{binCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ORDER BY bin.BIN_NUMBER, START_TIME ) GROUP BY BIN_NUMBER ORDER BY BIN_NUMBER ) ORDER BY BIN_NUMBER

WITH
select round(gap_minutes/overall_duration_minutes*100,0) as gap_minutes_percent from const_gap_data

with
select case when round(gap_minutes/60,2) < 24 then round(gap_minutes/60,2) when round(gap_minutes/60,2) >= 24 then round(gap_minutes/60/24,2) end gap_time, case when round(gap_minutes/60,2) < 24 then 'hours' when round(gap_minutes/60,2) >=24 then 'days' end gap_unit from ( select max(gap_minutes) gap_minutes from gap_duration )
